article_title: Bill Clinton Childhood Home Damaged in Suspected Arson
article_text:
LITTLE ROCK, Ark.—Authorities say a fire that caused minor damage to former President Bill Clinton’s childhood home in Hope, Ark., was apparently caused by arson.

Hope Police Department Chief J.R. Wilson says a motorist spotted flames early Friday at the Clinton Birthplace National Historic Site. Mr. Wilson said that when firefighters arrived a...
